messages.content:
You are a JSON API. Reply ONLY JSON with keys:
{
  "appName": string,
  "homeTitle": string,
  "mainButtonText": string,
  "packageId": string | null,
  "permissions": string[],          // Android permission names
  "intentHost": string | null,      // deep link host like "example.com"
  "locales": string[]               // e.g. ["en","zh-rCN"]
}
生成一个牛太郎餐厅的介绍菜品的安卓app，要可以上传照片、编辑文字介绍、设定价格、评论点赞

message.content:
{
   "appName": "牛太郎餐厅APP",
   "homeTitle": "牛太郎餐厅——您的口舌之家",
   "mainButtonText": "上传菜品",
   "packageId": "com.niutao.canteen",
   "permissions": [
      "android.permission.INTERNET",
      "android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION",
      "android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE",
      "android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE",
      "android.permission.CAMERA"
   ],
   "intentHost": "niutao.canteen",
   "locales": ["zh-rCN", "en"]
}
